title: They Creep Out at a Japanese Restaurant,  but then...the Secret to Protect Japanese from Harass
description:
#Chinainsights#Chinanews
Since December 9, 2023, an event has gone viral on both domestic and overseas Chinese online platforms. A Chinese restaurant in Tokyo was challenged by a Chinese patriotic netizen, also known as Little Pink. It triggered a public outcry and the situation escalated. Let's take a look at what happened.

Have questions? Do you have something to share with us about China? We want to hear from you!
